001package com.technototes.path.subsystem;
002
003import androidx.annotation.NonNull;
004
005import java.util.ArrayList;
006import java.util.Arrays;
007import java.util.List;
008import java.util.stream.Collectors;
009
010import com.acmerobotics.roadrunner.control.PIDCoefficients;
011import com.acmerobotics.roadrunner.drive.DriveSignal;
012import com.acmerobotics.roadrunner.drive.TankDrive;
013import com.acmerobotics.roadrunner.followers.TankPIDVAFollower;
014import com.acmerobotics.roadrunner.followers.TrajectoryFollower;
015import com.acmerobotics.roadrunner.geometry.Pose2d;
016import com.acmerobotics.roadrunner.localization.Localizer;
017import com.acmerobotics.roadrunner.trajectory.Trajectory;
018import com.acmerobotics.roadrunner.trajectory.TrajectoryBuilder;
019import com.acmerobotics.roadrunner.trajectory.constraints.AngularVelocityConstraint;
020import com.acmerobotics.roadrunner.trajectory.constraints.MinVelocityConstraint;
021import com.acmerobotics.roadrunner.trajectory.constraints.ProfileAccelerationConstraint;
022import com.acmerobotics.roadrunner.trajectory.constraints.TankVelocityConstraint;
023import com.acmerobotics.roadrunner.trajectory.constraints.TrajectoryAccelerationConstraint;
024import com.acmerobotics.roadrunner.trajectory.constraints.TrajectoryVelocityConstraint;
025import com.qualcomm.hardware.lynx.LynxModule;
026import com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.DcMotor;
027import com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.DcMotorEx;
028import com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.PIDFCoefficients;
029import com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.VoltageSensor;
030import com.qualcomm.robotcore.hardware.configuration.typecontainers.MotorConfigurationType;
031
032import com.technototes.library.hardware.HardwareDevice;
033import com.technototes.library.hardware.motor.EncodedMotorGroup;
034import com.technototes.library.hardware.sensor.IMU;
035import com.technototes.library.subsystem.Subsystem;
036import com.technototes.path.subsystem.TankConstants.*;
037import com.technototes.path.trajectorysequence.TrajectorySequence;
038import com.technototes.path.trajectorysequence.TrajectorySequenceBuilder;
039import com.technototes.path.trajectorysequence.TrajectorySequenceRunner;
040import com.technototes.path.util.LynxModuleUtil;
041
042public class TankDrivebaseSubsystem extends TankDrive implements Subsystem {
043
044    public final double TICKS_PER_REV, MAX_RPM;
045
046    public final boolean RUN_USING_ENCODER;
047
048    public final PIDFCoefficients MOTOR_VELO_PID;
049
050    public final double WHEEL_RADIUS, GEAR_RATIO, TRACK_WIDTH, kV, kA, kStatic;
051    public final double MAX_VEL, MAX_ACCEL, MAX_ANG_VEL, MAX_ANG_ACCEL;
052    public final PIDCoefficients AXIAL_PID, CROSS_TRACK_PID, HEADING_PID;
053    public final double LATERAL_MULTIPLIER, VX_WEIGHT, OMEGA_WEIGHT;
054
055    public final int POSE_HISTORY_LIMIT;
056
057    private TrajectorySequenceRunner trajectorySequenceRunner;
058
059    private final TrajectoryVelocityConstraint VEL_CONSTRAINT;
060
061    private final TrajectoryAccelerationConstraint ACCEL_CONSTRAINT;
062
063    private TrajectoryFollower follower;
064
065    private List<DcMotorEx> motors, leftMotors, rightMotors;
066    private IMU imu;
067
068    private VoltageSensor batteryVoltageSensor;
069
070    public TankDrivebaseSubsystem(
071            EncodedMotorGroup<DcMotorEx> left,
072            EncodedMotorGroup<DcMotorEx> right,
073            IMU i,
074            TankConstants c,
075            Localizer localizer) {
076        super(c.getDouble(KV.class), c.getDouble(KA.class), c.getDouble(KStatic.class), c.getDouble(TrackWidth.class));
077
078        TICKS_PER_REV = c.getDouble(TicksPerRev.class);
079        MAX_RPM = c.getDouble(MaxRPM.class);
080
081        RUN_USING_ENCODER = c.getBoolean(UseDriveEncoder.class);
082
083        MOTOR_VELO_PID = c.getPIDF(MotorVeloPID.class);
084
085        WHEEL_RADIUS = c.getDouble(WheelRadius.class);
086        GEAR_RATIO = c.getDouble(GearRatio.class);
087        TRACK_WIDTH = c.getDouble(TrackWidth.class);
088        kV = c.getDouble(KV.class);
089        kA = c.getDouble(KA.class);
090        kStatic = c.getDouble(KStatic.class);
091
092        MAX_VEL = c.getDouble(MaxVelo.class);
093        MAX_ACCEL = c.getDouble(MaxAccel.class);
094        MAX_ANG_VEL = c.getDouble(MaxAngleVelo.class);
095        MAX_ANG_ACCEL = c.getDouble(MaxAngleAccel.class);
096
097        HEADING_PID = c.getPID(HeadPID.class);
098        AXIAL_PID = c.getPID(AxialPID.class);
099        CROSS_TRACK_PID = c.getPID(CrossPID.class);
100
101        LATERAL_MULTIPLIER = c.getDouble(LateralMult.class);
102        VX_WEIGHT = c.getDouble(VXWeight.class);
103        OMEGA_WEIGHT = c.getDouble(OmegaWeight.class);
104
105        POSE_HISTORY_LIMIT = c.getInt(PoseLimit.class);
106
107        follower = new TankPIDVAFollower(AXIAL_PID, CROSS_TRACK_PID, new Pose2d(0.5, 0.5, Math.toRadians(5.0)), 0.5);
108
109        VEL_CONSTRAINT = getVelocityConstraint(MAX_VEL, MAX_ANG_VEL, TRACK_WIDTH);
110        ACCEL_CONSTRAINT = getAccelerationConstraint(MAX_ACCEL);
111
112        LynxModuleUtil.ensureMinimumFirmwareVersion(HardwareDevice.hardwareMap);
113
114        batteryVoltageSensor =
115                HardwareDevice.hardwareMap.voltageSensor.iterator().next();
116
117        for (LynxModule module : HardwareDevice.hardwareMap.getAll(LynxModule.class)) {
118            module.setBulkCachingMode(LynxModule.BulkCachingMode.AUTO);
119        }
120
121        // TODO: adjust the names of the following hardware devices to match your configuration
122        imu = i.radians().initialize();
123
124        // TODO: if your hub is mounted vertically, remap the IMU axes so that the z-axis points
125        // upward (normal to the floor) using a command like the following:
126        // BNO055IMUUtil.remapAxes(imu, AxesOrder.XYZ, AxesSigns.NPN);
127
128        // add/remove motors depending on your robot (e.g., 6WD)
129
130        motors = new ArrayList<>();
131        leftMotors =
132                left.getAllDeviceList().stream().map(HardwareDevice::getDevice).collect(Collectors.toList());
133        rightMotors =
134                right.getAllDeviceList().stream().map(HardwareDevice::getDevice).collect(Collectors.toList());
135        motors.addAll(leftMotors);
136        motors.addAll(rightMotors);
137
138        for (DcMotorEx motor : motors) {
139            MotorConfigurationType motorConfigurationType = motor.getMotorType().clone();
140            motorConfigurationType.setAchieveableMaxRPMFraction(1.0);
141            motor.setMotorType(motorConfigurationType);
142        }
143
144        if (c.getBoolean(TankConstants.UseDriveEncoder.class)) {
145            setMode(DcMotor.RunMode.RUN_USING_ENCODER);
146        }
147
148        setZeroPowerBehavior(DcMotor.ZeroPowerBehavior.BRAKE);
149
150        if (RUN_USING_ENCODER && MOTOR_VELO_PID != null) {
151            setPIDFCoefficients(DcMotor.RunMode.RUN_USING_ENCODER, MOTOR_VELO_PID);
152        }
153
154        // TODO: reverse any motors using DcMotor.setDirection()
155
156        // TODO: if desired, use setLocalizer() to change the localization method
157        // for instance, setLocalizer(new ThreeTrackingWheelLocalizer(...));
158
159        trajectorySequenceRunner = new TrajectorySequenceRunner(follower, HEADING_PID);
160    }
161
162    public TrajectoryBuilder trajectoryBuilder(Pose2d startPose) {
163        return new TrajectoryBuilder(startPose, VEL_CONSTRAINT, ACCEL_CONSTRAINT);
164    }
165
166    public TrajectoryBuilder trajectoryBuilder(Pose2d startPose, boolean reversed) {
167        return new TrajectoryBuilder(startPose, reversed, VEL_CONSTRAINT, ACCEL_CONSTRAINT);
168    }
169
170    public TrajectoryBuilder trajectoryBuilder(Pose2d startPose, double startHeading) {
171        return new TrajectoryBuilder(startPose, startHeading, VEL_CONSTRAINT, ACCEL_CONSTRAINT);
172    }
173
174    public TrajectorySequenceBuilder trajectorySequenceBuilder(Pose2d startPose) {
175        return new TrajectorySequenceBuilder(startPose, VEL_CONSTRAINT, ACCEL_CONSTRAINT, MAX_ANG_VEL, MAX_ANG_ACCEL);
176    }
177
178    public void turnAsync(double angle) {
179        trajectorySequenceRunner.followTrajectorySequenceAsync(
180                trajectorySequenceBuilder(getPoseEstimate()).turn(angle).build());
181    }
182
183    public void turn(double angle) {
184        turnAsync(angle);
185        waitForIdle();
186    }
187
188    public void followTrajectoryAsync(Trajectory trajectory) {
189        trajectorySequenceRunner.followTrajectorySequenceAsync(trajectorySequenceBuilder(trajectory.start())
190                .addTrajectory(trajectory)
191                .build());
192    }
193
194    public void followTrajectory(Trajectory trajectory) {
195        followTrajectoryAsync(trajectory);
196        waitForIdle();
197    }
198
199    public void followTrajectorySequenceAsync(TrajectorySequence trajectorySequence) {
200        trajectorySequenceRunner.followTrajectorySequenceAsync(trajectorySequence);
201    }
202
203    public void followTrajectorySequence(TrajectorySequence trajectorySequence) {
204        followTrajectorySequenceAsync(trajectorySequence);
205        waitForIdle();
206    }
207
208    public Pose2d getLastError() {
209        return trajectorySequenceRunner.getLastPoseError();
210    }
211
212    public void update() {
213        updatePoseEstimate();
214        DriveSignal signal = trajectorySequenceRunner.update(getPoseEstimate(), getPoseVelocity());
215        if (signal != null) setDriveSignal(signal);
216    }
217
218    public void waitForIdle() {
219        while (!Thread.currentThread().isInterrupted() && isBusy()) update();
220    }
221
222    public boolean isBusy() {
223        return trajectorySequenceRunner.isBusy();
224    }
225
226    public void setMode(DcMotor.RunMode runMode) {
227        for (DcMotorEx motor : motors) {
228            motor.setMode(runMode);
229        }
230    }
231
232    public void setZeroPowerBehavior(DcMotor.ZeroPowerBehavior zeroPowerBehavior) {
233        for (DcMotorEx motor : motors) {
234            motor.setZeroPowerBehavior(zeroPowerBehavior);
235        }
236    }
237
238    public void setPIDFCoefficients(DcMotor.RunMode runMode, PIDFCoefficients coefficients) {
239        PIDFCoefficients compensatedCoefficients = new PIDFCoefficients(
240                coefficients.p,
241                coefficients.i,
242                coefficients.d,
243                coefficients.f * 12 / batteryVoltageSensor.getVoltage());
244        for (DcMotorEx motor : motors) {
245            motor.setPIDFCoefficients(runMode, compensatedCoefficients);
246        }
247    }
248
249    public void setWeightedDrivePower(Pose2d drivePower) {
250        Pose2d vel = drivePower;
251
252        if (Math.abs(drivePower.getX()) + Math.abs(drivePower.getHeading()) > 1) {
253            // re-normalize the powers according to the weights
254            double denom = VX_WEIGHT * Math.abs(drivePower.getX()) + OMEGA_WEIGHT * Math.abs(drivePower.getHeading());
255
256            vel = new Pose2d(VX_WEIGHT * drivePower.getX(), 0, OMEGA_WEIGHT * drivePower.getHeading()).div(denom);
257        }
258
259        setDrivePower(vel);
260    }
261
262    @NonNull @Override
263    public List<Double> getWheelPositions() {
264        double leftSum = 0, rightSum = 0;
265        for (DcMotorEx leftMotor : leftMotors) {
266            leftSum += TankConstants.encoderTicksToInches(
267                    leftMotor.getCurrentPosition(), WHEEL_RADIUS, GEAR_RATIO, TICKS_PER_REV);
268            for (DcMotorEx rightMotor : rightMotors) {
269                rightSum += TankConstants.encoderTicksToInches(
270                        rightMotor.getCurrentPosition(), WHEEL_RADIUS, GEAR_RATIO, TICKS_PER_REV);
271            }
272        }
273        return Arrays.asList(leftSum / leftMotors.size(), rightSum / rightMotors.size());
274    }
275
276    public List<Double> getWheelVelocities() {
277        double leftSum = 0, rightSum = 0;
278        for (DcMotorEx leftMotor : leftMotors) {
279            leftSum += TankConstants.encoderTicksToInches(
280                    leftMotor.getVelocity(), WHEEL_RADIUS, GEAR_RATIO, TICKS_PER_REV);
281        }
282        for (DcMotorEx rightMotor : rightMotors) {
283            rightSum += TankConstants.encoderTicksToInches(
284                    rightMotor.getVelocity(), WHEEL_RADIUS, GEAR_RATIO, TICKS_PER_REV);
285        }
286        return Arrays.asList(leftSum / leftMotors.size(), rightSum / rightMotors.size());
287    }
288
289    @Override
290    public void setMotorPowers(double v, double v1) {
291        for (DcMotorEx leftMotor : leftMotors) {
292            leftMotor.setPower(v);
293        }
294        for (DcMotorEx rightMotor : rightMotors) {
295            rightMotor.setPower(v1);
296        }
297    }
298
299    @Override
300    public double getRawExternalHeading() {
301        return imu.getAngularOrientation().firstAngle;
302    }
303
304    @Override
305    public Double getExternalHeadingVelocity() {
306        // TODO: This must be changed to match your configuration
307        //                           | Z axis
308        //                           |
309        //     (Motor Port Side)     |   / X axis
310        //                       ____|__/____
311        //          Y axis     / *   | /    /|   (IO Side)
312        //          _________ /______|/    //      I2C
313        //                   /___________ //     Digital
314        //                  |____________|/      Analog
315        //
316        //                 (Servo Port Side)
317        //
318        // The positive x axis points toward the USB port(s)
319        //
320        // Adjust the axis rotation rate as necessary
321        // Rotate about the z axis is the default assuming your REV Hub/Control Hub is laying
322        // flat on a surface
323
324        return (double) imu.getAngularVelocity().zRotationRate;
325    }
326
327    public static TrajectoryVelocityConstraint getVelocityConstraint(
328            double maxVel, double maxAngularVel, double trackWidth) {
329        return new MinVelocityConstraint(Arrays.asList(
330                new AngularVelocityConstraint(maxAngularVel), new TankVelocityConstraint(maxVel, trackWidth)));
331    }
332
333    public static TrajectoryAccelerationConstraint getAccelerationConstraint(double maxAccel) {
334        return new ProfileAccelerationConstraint(maxAccel);
335    }
336}
